Pure hazel contacts are one of the most popular types of cosmetic lenses. This color is often associated with mystery and exoticism, making these contacts perfect for dates or any occasion.

Grey is a versatile color with its own magnetism. Colored contact lenses in grey give a well-balanced neutral undertone to any style statement. They make for a natural choice for that soft, subtle look.

The ‘brilliant blue’ is a brighter and bolder version of the classic blue that would enhance your style anywhere. The intricate Hues of Blue – Available in the Bausch & Lomb Lacelle Colors Collection, these contact lenses have delicately patterned designs on them, giving the appearance of bigger and bolder eyes.
